results.name: Number of times that k^2 + (n-k)^2 is prime for 1 <= k <= n-1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..16384
xref: Cf. A036468 (number of ways to represent 2n+1 as a+b with a^2+b^2 prime).
results.author: CHAUVIN thierry (thierry.chaun2(AT)wanadoo.fr), Apr 30 2003
